Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: mama j
Reviews.Content: My daughter got this camera for her 15th birthday. She hasn't put it down since! The pictures are beautiful. Worth every penny.

ProductInfo.Features:
GE X500 16 MP 15x Optical/6x Digital Zoom Camera General Features: Gold color
16 megapixels effective 16.5 megapixels image sensor (1/2.33-inch CCD)
2.7-inch TFT color LCD (230,400 pixels) Electronic Image stabilization
Exif 2.2 (JPEG) still image files MOV (Motion JPEG movie files, Audio: G.711 [Monaural]
Panorama mode
ProductInfo.Name: GE X500 Gold Digital 16MP Camera
